page.title: 17Services in Ribchester
page.content: The Ribble valley B.C. mows grass and they tidy the sides of the road,cut hedges,mend stiles,gates,paths and pavements. The water in Ribchester comes from Dilworth Treatment plant Longridge.The sewage is processed near Lower Alston Farm in Ribchester. Then the sludge goes to Freckleton Marsh. There is a map to show where all the pipes go at the Supply Office Ribble- ton Lane,Preston. The mobile library comes to Ribchester once every fort- night on a Monday in the afternoon. The bus service in Ribchester comes from Longridge down Preston Road and stops at the bus stop,then goes on along Blackburn Road then on to Blackburn.
